name: Rabbi Daniel Kalish
bio: Rabbi Daniel Kalish shlit'a learned in Yeshiva of Far Rockaway and then at the Mir, Yerushalayim.  He came back to help start Yeshiva Ateres Shmuel of Waterbury and is currently the Menahel of the Mesivta of Waterbury.  Rabbi Kalish has gained acclaim for his wonderful shmoozen that awaken, inspire and encourage people to reach their potential as an Eved Hashem.  We are privileged to have R' Kalish's shiurim on Shas Illuminated.

name: Rabbi Tzvi Thaler
bio: Rabbi Tzvi Thaler, a popular Rebbe for the last 17 years in Yeshiva Ateres Shmuel of Waterbury, is known for his tremendous clarity in giving over a sugya. Over the last few years, his shiur in Dirshu Daf Yomi B'Halacha has become increasingly popular and is now enjoyed by hundreds of b’nai Torah worldwide. Rabbi Thaler’s clear and concise delivery opens up the world of halacha, bringing the Mishna Berura to life.
